boardgame.name: Civitas Hamburgum
Hamburgum
boardgame.description: Hamburg in the 17th century! Mighty walls protect the city against the devastations of the Thirty Years War. Thanks to Protestant refugees, Hamburg has become the biggest and most prosperous city in Germany. From far away, the skyline shows the steeples of huge churches and the masts of mighty trade ships displaying the citizens' pride and prosperity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Hamburgum, players guide the families of Hamburg in the pursuit of wealth and prestige. They produce beer, sugar, and cloth and ship these goods overseas. They compete over the best sites for their buildings and the best berths for their ships in the harbor. Ultimately, they vie for the most prestigious church donations, because neither gold nor goods but only prestige decides the final outcome._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Hamburgum: Lisboa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Hamburgum: Antverpia_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

The game itself is in very good condition. However this is a former World Boardgaming Championships gaming library item which was sold through the WBC Game auction in 2013, where I purchased it. They mark their library games with stickers saying, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Property of..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and they then cover those stickers with another saying _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Sold at the WBC auction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. So there are a few of these stickers on the outside of the box. So this is obvisouly a gamers copy, not a collectors copy which is why I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling it cheaply.
